title: ‘Texas Chainsaw Massacre’ and the Most Extreme, Disreputable Movies Ever
description:
We’re looking at the latest chapter in the ‘Texas Chainsaw Massacre’ story, now available on Netflix, and the history of extreme, depraved, disgusting, and shocking movies with writer, director, and returning champion Alex Ross Perry.

Host: Sean Fennessey
Guest: Alex Ross Perry
Producer: Bobby Wagner
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
